response.original_title: Valley of Hope: The Armenian Journey from Terror to Triumph
response.overview: ValleyPBS marks the 100th anniversary of the Armenian Genocide with a special production. The stories of the victims of the genocide are told through interviews with survivorsâ€™ children and grandchildren. The success of Armenians in the Central Valley and the role faith and family plays in Armenian culture is also explored. Over 20 individuals and organizations are featured in this documentary.
response.title: Valley of Hope: The Armenian Journey from Terror to Triumph
